text: Cláudia Carceroni-Saintagne (born 8 November 1962) is a road cyclist from Brazil. She represented her nation at the 1992 Summer Olympics in the women's road race and at the 2000 Summer Olympics in the women's road race. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at sports-reference.com Category:Brazilian female cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Brazil Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Belo Horizonte Category:1962 births
title: Cláudia Carceroni-Saintagne
